title: MERN Blogging Platform using Appwrite
features: Designed and built a full‑stack blogging platform using React, Node/Express, and Appwrite, integrating secure JWT authentication, real‑time post CRUD, and MongoDB persistence to support 10k concurrent users.
Created a modular component library (AuthLayout, PostCard, Input, Button) with TypeScript and ESLint, cutting development time by 30% and improving maintainability across the codebase.
Implemented client‑side caching and optimized API calls, reducing page load times by 45% and boosting user engagement metrics.
